Perspecta has an immediate need in our US Public Sector group for a Data Analyst - DoD Security Clearance Eligible. Located in Plano, TX or Pontiac, MI.

Job Description:

Analysis of data and construction of models to evaluate policies, processes, and metrics, and develop algorithms and decision support capabilities using statistical analysis, simulation, and other operations research techniques.

Qualifications

Qualifications:
  • Strong foundation in statistical data analysis, and experience using advanced capabilities in MS Excel and MS Access
  • 2 years experience as a practicing analyst, OR a Masters degree in a relevant filed, OR relevant Navy experience
  • Ability to obtain a Public Trust or Secret Security clearance
Preferred Experience [Includes Any of the Following]:
  • Experience with data analysis using large data sets, in any tool/language
  • Experience in Operations Research, simulation, and/or modeling
  • Experience working with MS SQL Server database
  • Experience in coding in C# or VB.NET
  • Experience with statistical tools like SPSS, SAS, or R
  • Experience in modeling and building Data Visualization techniques to present large data sets.
  • Familiarity with SQL Server Analysis Services and/or Business Objects.
  • Knowledge of Navy veteran or Navy manpower, personnel, training, and education related business functions
  • Industrial Psychology or Psychometrics background
